QuestData.Title: A Roc-ing Appetite
QuestData.Description:
Segallia seems like a good egg, good with gadgets, but she panics easily.
For example: When I sent her into the caves directly south of here, she was promptly run out of them by an unusually large harpy. Seems it was giving orders to the others as well.
Could it be the matriarch of this brood? Perhaps a commander of some kind? Get in there and find out, $n.
And don't be afraid to ruffle a few feathers, if you know what I mean.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A particularly large Screechflight harpy with a gruesome appetite for Bluefeather bones.
QuestData.RewardText:
My fine-tuned bird senses are telling me these Screechflight aren't just here for snacks...
But you did well, $n! Let me decipher this scroll and we'll find out just what these harpies are after.
